thread.title: Dollar Tree, Inc. to Host Fourth Quarter Earnings Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Dollar Tree, Inc. to Host Fourth Quarter Earnings Conference Call
text:
CHESAPEAKE, Va.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Dollar Tree, Inc. (NASDAQ: DLTR), North America's leading operator of discount variety stores, will host its conference call for investors and analysts to discuss financial results for the fourth quarter ended February 3, 2018.
WHEN: Wednesday, March 7, 2018 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time PARTICIPATE: At least 5 minutes prior to the conference call, please dial 888-461-2021 for USA and Canadian calls or 719-457-2735 for international calls.
WEBCAST: Available on the investor relations section of the Company's website at www.dollartreeinfo.com/investors/news/events .
REPLAY: A recorded version of the call will be available until midnight Wednesday, March 14, and may be accessed by dialing 888-203-1112. Please enter Passcode # 4229818.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180221005131/en/
Dollar Tree, Inc., Chesapeake
Randy Guiler
757-321-5284
www.DollarTree.com
DLTR-E
Source: Dollar Tree, Inc.
